forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle between 10pm and 4am, then a slight chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 52. Southwest wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, a gentle sunlight is spilling over the city, casting a warm glow across its charming streets. The day unfolds mostly sunny, with temperatures settling comfortably around the mid-60s, though a soft coolness lingers suggesting a swift transition towards the afternoon chill. Wind whispers through the city at a light pace, as if carrying with it the stories of the day. Yet, a subtle shift looms; as evening approaches, clouds will weave themselves into the fabric of the sky, bringing with them the slightest possibility of drizzle — a reminder that even the sunniest days in this city can take an unexpected turn.

Glimpses of the marine layer can be seen hugging the hills, a hazy blanket that competes with the vibrant blue above. This interplay of weather provides a wonderful opportunity to dress in layers, allowing one to adapt as the sun dances into the horizon. As the day unfolds towards evening, consider meandering through the bustling farmer’s market or capturing the sunset from a cozy café, indulging in a few quiet moments. Should the rain make its delicate appearance later tonight, an intimate evening at home with a favorite book might beckon, enhancing the charm of this ever-enigmatic city.
